original_text: I looked, and I saw a white horse. The person who was riding the horse held a bow. Someone gave him a crown. He had fought against many people and he had won. Now he rode out on his horse to win against many more people.
korean_text: 이에 내가 보니 흰 말이 있는데 그 탄 자가 활을 가졌고 면류관을 받고 나아가서 이기고 또 이기려고 하더라

sentences.original_text: I looked, and I saw a white horse.
The person who was riding the horse held a bow.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 말을 탄 사람이 활을 가졌더라

sentences.original_text: He had fought against many people
Now he rode out on his horse
to win against many more people.
